actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relative to rights of Ukrainian citizens.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares the sense of Congress that the President shall take steps to: (1) call upon the Soviet Union to permit the resurrection of the Ukrainian Orthodox and Catholic Churches; (2) contact the officials of the Soviet Union to secure freedom of worship in the Soviet Union and Eastern Europe; and (3) raise the question of Stalin's liquidation of such churches with national and international religious councils.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relative to rights of Ukrainian citizens.
